author: jleroux
msg: Applied patch from jira issue - OFBIZ-5416 - Sales order cart items already assigned to ship groups are incorrectly able to be modified to quantities/prices that break the ProductStoreShipmentMeth rules.
Thanks Christian for reporting the issue and Thanks Arun for providing the patch.

author: jleroux
msg: Applied patch from jira issue - OFBIZ-5416 - Sales order cart items already assigned to ship groups are incorrectly able to be modified to quantities/prices that break the ProductStoreShipmentMeth rules.
Thanks Christian for reporting the issue and Thanks Arun for providing the patch.

author: rjernst
msg: Fix patch tool to better compare svn vs git checkouts, and not require comparing roots of checkouts (merged 1639914)

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-4059][UIMA-4099][UIMA-3399][UIMA-4105][UIMA-4100] add support for checking invalid updates to FS keys that are "indexed".  Remove now-extra check of wrong sofa when adding to index.  Improve view iterator to no longer create extra Java collection object. Set Bag Index impl to PositiveIntSet if not allowing duplicate addToIndexes. Add JVM props for controlling dup addToIndexes and checking wrong Sofa, add impl of checking wrong Sofa. Fix RefIterator to start at leftmost position in case of Equals. Fix XCas and XMI Deser. to delay addToIndexes until FSs are "fixedup" to avoid spurious wrong Sofa errors.

author: rjernst
msg: Fix patch tool to better compare svn vs git checkouts, and not require comparing roots of checkouts
